entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
